description.english: Defeat the Skeleton King on the Veteran difficulty level
description.russian: Победи Короля Скелетов на сложности Ветеран
description.schinese: 在老兵难度下击败骷髅王
description.tchinese: 在老兵難度下擊敗骷髏王
description.brazilian: Derrote o Rei Esqueleto no modo de dificuldade Veterano

description.turkish: Gazi zorluk seviyesinde İskeletor'u yen

description.spanish: Derrota al Rey esqueleto en el nivel de dificultad Veterano
description.japanese: 難易度「ベテラン」でがいこつ王を倒す

description.japanese: 難易度「ベテラン」でクラーケンを倒す

description.english: Dodge 10 attacks at the last moment
description.russian: Увернись в последний момент от 10 атак
description.schinese: 在最后时刻闪避10次攻击
description.tchinese: 在最後時刻閃避10次攻擊
description.brazilian: Desvie de 10 ataques no último momento
description.french: Esquiver 10 attaques au dernier moment
description.turkish: Son anda 10 saldırıdan kaçın
description.german: Weiche 10 Angriffen im letzten Moment aus
description.spanish: Esquiva 10 ataques en el último momento
description.japanese: ギリギリのタイミングで攻撃を 10 回回避する

description.english: Kill enemies with a Power Attack 10 times
description.russian: Убей врагов усиленным ударом 10 раз
description.schinese: 使用强力攻击杀死敌人10次
description.tchinese: 使用強力攻擊殺死敵人10次
description.brazilian: Elimine inimigos com um Ataque de Força 10 vezes
description.french: Tuer des ennemis avec une attaque puissante 10 fois
description.turkish: Düşmanları 10 defa Güçlü Saldırı kullanarak öldür
description.german: Töte 10 Mal Gegner mit einem Machtangriff
description.spanish: Mata enemigos con un ataque potente 10 veces
description.japanese: パワーアタックで敵を 10 人キルする

description.english: Kill 10 enemies with an additional weapon shot
description.russian: Убей 10 врагов выстрелом дополнительного оружия
description.schinese: 使用副武器杀死10名敌人
description.tchinese: 使用副武器殺死10名敵人
description.brazilian: Elimine 10 inimigos com um tiro adicional
description.french: Tuer 10 ennemis avec un tir d'arme supplémentaire
description.turkish: İkincil silahla 10 düşman öldür
description.german: Töte 10 Gegner mit einem zusätzlichen Waffenschuss
description.spanish: Mata a 10 enemigos con un disparo del arma adicional
description.japanese: 追加武器ショットで敵を 10 人キルする

description.english: Pick up 150 dropped coins
description.russian: Подними 150 выпавших монет
description.schinese: 拾取150枚掉落的金币
description.tchinese: 拾取150枚掉落的金幣
description.brazilian: Colete 150 moedas descartadas
description.french: Ramasser 150 pièces de monnaie
description.turkish: Yerden 150 sikke topla
description.german: Sammle 150 fallengelassene Münzen ein
description.spanish: Recoge 150 monedas caídas
description.japanese: 落ちたコインを 150 枚拾う

description.english: Win 3 battles in a row without taking damage
description.russian: Победи в 3 боях подряд не получив повреждений
description.schinese: 在未受到伤害的前提下，连续赢得3场战斗
description.tchinese: 在未受到傷害的前提下，連續贏得3場戰鬥
description.brazilian: Vença 3 batalhas seguidas sem levar dano
description.french: Gagner 3 batailles d'affilée sans subir de dégâts.
description.turkish: Hiç hasar almadan 3 savaş kazan
description.german: Gewinne 3 Kämpfe hintereinander, ohne Schaden zu nehmen
description.koreana: 아무런 피해도 받지 않고 3회 연속으로 전투에서 승리하세요
description.spanish: Gana 3 batallas seguidas sin recibir daños
description.japanese: ダメージを受けずに 3 連勝する

description.english: Kill 5 enemies with traps in one battle
description.russian: Убей капканами 5 врагов в одном бою
description.schinese: 在一场战斗中，使用陷阱杀死5名敌人
description.tchinese: 在一場戰鬥中，使用陷阱殺死5名敵人
description.brazilian: Elimine 5 inimigos com armadilhas em uma batalha
description.french: Tuer 5 ennemis à l'aide de pièges au cours d'une bataille.
description.turkish: Bir savaşta tuzak kullanarak 5 düşman öldür
description.german: Töte 5 Gegner mit Fallen in einem Kampf
description.spanish: Mata a 5 enemigos con trampas en una batalla
description.japanese: 1 回の戦闘で罠を使って敵を 5 人キルする

description.english: Hit 4 enemies with a grenade
description.russian: Попади гранатой в 4 врага
description.schinese: 用一枚手雷同时击中4名敌人
description.tchinese: 用一枚手雷同時擊中4名敵人
description.brazilian: Atinja 4 inimigos com uma granada
description.french: Toucher 4 ennemis avec une grenade
description.turkish: Bomba ile 4 düşmana hasar ver
description.german: Triff 4 Gegner mit einer Granate
description.spanish: Acierta a 4 enemigos con una granada
description.japanese: グレネードで敵を 4 人ヒットする

description.english: Pull out a Success or a Big Success 5 times in one adventure
description.russian: Вытащи Успех или Большой Успех 5 раз за один рейд

description.turkish: Bir macerada 5 kere Başarılı ya da Büyük Başarı kartı çek
description.german: Schaffe in einem Abenteuer 5 Mal einen Erfolg oder einen großen Erfolg
description.spanish: Saca un Éxito o un Gran éxito 5 veces en una aventura
